Name: Sistrum fragment
Description: A part of the handle from a sistrum, double sided with the face of the goddess Hathor. She has a distinctive curling wig and the ears of a cow. On either side are uraei, one crowned with a disk the other with the white crown. Above the head of Hathor is a cornice on top of which sits the figure of a small cat, possibly representative of the goddess Bastet as sistra were associated particularly with her and Hathor.
